@lolman0 dude, read the first chapter before making a dumb wall of text. MC is into chucking. Part 1 even explains why and how he discovered he was into it. At the end of the manga she told him she got invited by some dudes and asked MC what she should do. (This chapter exists so he told her to go). At the end of this chapter, he has a monolog about how amazing it feels getting cucked but how bad he feels for making her do those things. The last page is her saying everything is fine.
pathetic.

Well all I can say it that if you have a girlfriend who wants to be dominated and be kept on a leash like this girl here, don't be afraid to do so or other hands will reach her while you ain't looking.
if I was this guy I would either A: keep her in the garbage bin while looking at her in a disgusting way flipping her off and close it saying -Do what you want you disgusting pig- and off I go on with my life, B: Put on her an invisible leash which means never separate from her, giving her the sexual needs that she needs until she is 120% satisfies so she won't go off by her own to get satisfaction from others, give the video tapes as blackmail possibly rape evidence to the police to get the dudes on the wanted list and if I saw the dudes somewhere out there then I would personally take care of them.
this piece of work is not for the weak heart and not for nice people. I give it 9/10 for life lesson, 8/10 for the art.
